person.persName: William Sowers (Brown County, Ohio, farmer, basket maker, and soldier)

body.p: Brown County, Ohio, farmer, basket maker, and soldier. Ohio native. Son of Benjamin Sowers and Mary Sowers. Farmer in Union, Brown County, in 1860. Basket maker in Vinton County in 1863. Served as private in the 172nd Ohio Infantry (U.S.A.).
